metaTags.metaDescription: Join us here for our updates and announcements for exciting updates during Security Week.

relatedBlades.title: Security Week 2023
relatedBlades.copy: During this year's Security Week, we'll make Zero Trust even more accessible and enterprise-ready, better protect brands from phishing and fraud, streamline security management, deliver dynamic machine learning protections and more.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Week 23 Hero Illustration
imageAssetFile.title: Security Week 23 Hero Illustration

features.title: Everything you might have missed during Security Week 2023
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare made it easier to shift from protecting applications, to protecting employees, and making sure they are protected everywhere during Security Week 2023.

imageAssetFile.altText: Everything you might have missed during Security Week 2023
imageAssetFile.title: Everything you might have missed during Security Week 2023

features.title: Welcome to Security Week
features.description: Welcome to Security Week 2023 we'll demonstrate how Cloudflare is making it as easy as possible to shift from protecting applications, to protecting employees, and making sure they are protected everywhere.

imageAssetFile.altText: Welcome to Security Week
imageAssetFile.title: Welcome to Security Week

features.title: Top 50 Most Impersonated Brands in phishing attacks and new tools you can use to protect your employees from them
features.description: We're expanding the phishing protections available to Cloudflare One customers by automatically identifying—and blocking—so-called "confusable" domains. Common misspellings (cloudfalre.com) and concatenation of services (cloudflare-okta.com) are often registered by attackers to trick unsuspecting victims into submitting private information such as passwords, and these new tools provide an additional layer of protection against such attempts.

imageAssetFile.altText: Most phished brands and new tools you can use to protect your employees against phishing
imageAssetFile.title: Most phished brands and new tools you can use to protect your employees against phishing

features.title: How to stay safe from phishing (and avoid being the bait)
features.description: Phishing attacks come in all sorts of ways to fool people. Email is definitely the most common, but there are others. Following up on our "Top 50 Most Impersonated Brands in Phishing Attacks" post, here are some tips to help you catch these scams before you fall for them.

imageAssetFile.altText: How to protect yourself from Phishing Attacks
imageAssetFile.title: How to protect yourself from Phishing Attacks

features.title: Mutual TLS now available for Workers
features.description: Mutual TLS is used to secure a range of network services and applications: APIs, web applications, microservices, databases and IoT devices. With mTLS support for Workers you can use Workers to authenticate to any service secured by mTLS directly!

imageAssetFile.title: Mutual TLS for Workers

features.title: Locking down your JavaScript: positive blocking with Page Shield policies
features.description: Starting today, using Page Shield, Cloudflare's client side security solution, you can ensure only vetted and secure JavaScript is being executed by your user's browsers. Stop unwanted JavaScript and keep your end user data safe with Page Shield policies.

imageAssetFile.altText: Page Shield positive blocking
imageAssetFile.title: Page Shield positive blocking

features.title: Using Cloudflare Access with CNI
features.description: We are thrilled to introduce an innovative new approach to secure hosted applications via Cloudflare Access without the need for any installed software or custom code on your application server. But before we dive into how this is possible, let's review why Access previously required installed software or custom code on your application server.

imageAssetFile.altText: Access without cloudflared using Cloud CNI
imageAssetFile.title: Access without cloudflared using Cloud CNI

features.title: Cloudflare Aegis: dedicated IPs for Zero Trust migration
features.description: Lock down your services with Cloudflare Aegis: dedicated IPs for Cloudflare egress back to your applications.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Aegis: dedicated egress IPs to provide secure origin protection
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Aegis: dedicated egress IPs to provide secure origin protection

features.title: No hassle migration from Zscaler to Cloudflare One with The Descaler Program
features.description: Cloudflare is excited to launch the Descaler Program, a frictionless path to migrate existing Zscaler customers to Cloudflare One. Cloudflare is making it even easier for enterprise customers to make the switch to a faster, simpler, and more agile foundation for security and network transformation.

imageAssetFile.altText: Frictionless Managed migration from Zscaler to Cloudflare One
imageAssetFile.title: Frictionless Managed migration from Zscaler to Cloudflare One

features.title: The state of application security in 2023
features.description: One year ago we published our first Application Security Report. For Security Week 2023, we are providing updated insights and trends around mitigated traffic, bot and API traffic, and account takeover attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Application Security Trends report
imageAssetFile.title: Application Security Trends report

features.title: Scan and secure Atlassian with Cloudflare CASB
features.description: Cloudflare CASB can now integrate and scan Atlassian products, Confluence and Jira, for critical security issues, like misconfigurations, data exposure, and third-party app risks. Start scanning in just a few clicks!

imageAssetFile.altText: Secure Atlassian with CASB
imageAssetFile.title: Secure Atlassian with CASB

features.title: Adding Zero Trust signals to Sumo Logic for better security insights
features.description: Announcing the expansion of support for automated normalization and correlation of Zero Trust logs for Logpush in Sumo Logic's Cloud SIEM.

imageAssetFile.altText: Sumo Logic integration for ZT logs
imageAssetFile.title: Sumo Logic integration for ZT logs

features.title: Cloudflare One DLP integrates with Microsoft Information Protection labels
features.description: Cloudflare One now supports Data Loss Prevention using Microsoft's Information Protection labels.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare one customers can sync Microsoft Labels with a DLP Profile
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare one customers can sync Microsoft Labels with a DLP Profile

features.title: Zero Trust security with Ping Identity and Cloudflare Access
features.description: Cloudflare Access and Ping Identity offer a powerful solution for organizations looking to implement Zero Trust security controls to protect their applications and data.

imageAssetFile.altText: Zero Trust security with Ping Identity and Cloudflare Access
imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust security with Ping Identity and Cloudflare Access

features.title: How sophisticated scammers and phishers are preying on customers of Silicon Valley Bank
features.description: In order to breach trust and trick unsuspecting victims, threat actors overwhelmingly use topical events as lures. The news about what happened at Silicon Valley Bank is the latest event to watch out for and stay vigilant against opportunistic phishing campaigns using SVB as the lure

imageAssetFile.altText: Opportunistic phishing/ SVB
imageAssetFile.title: Opportunistic phishing/ SVB

features.title: Announcing Cloudflare Fraud Detection
features.description: Cloudflare Fraud Detection uses machine learning models to better protect businesses from fake account signups, account takeover attacks, and carding attacks to ensure businesses can operate online safely.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare uses new ML system to block fraudulent transactions
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare uses new ML system to block fraudulent transactions

features.title: Automatically discovering API endpoints and generating schemas using machine learning
features.description: Today we're announcing that Cloudflare can now automatically discover all API endpoints and learn API schemas for all of our API Gateway customers. Customers can use these new features to enforce a positive security model on their APIs even if they have little-to-no information about their APIs today.

imageAssetFile.altText: Using ML to discover endpoints
imageAssetFile.title: Using ML to discover endpoints

features.title: Detecting API abuse automatically using sequence analysis
features.description: Today, we're announcing Cloudflare Sequence Analytics for APIs. Using Sequence Analytics, Customers subscribed to API Gateway can view the most important sequences of API requests to their endpoints. This new feature helps customers to apply protection to the most important endpoints first.

imageAssetFile.altText: Sequential Analytics
imageAssetFile.title: Sequential Analytics

features.title: Using the power of Cloudflare's global network to detect malicious domains using machine learning
features.description: Cloudflare has developed proprietary models leveraging machine learning and other advanced analytical techniques to detect security threats that take advantage of the domain name system (DNS).

imageAssetFile.altText: Protecting users with machine learning
imageAssetFile.title: Protecting users with machine learning

features.title: Analyze any URL safely using the Cloudflare Radar URL Scanner
features.description: Try our URL Scanner. Cloudflare Radar's newest free tool for an under-the-hood look at any webpage.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of the Cloudflare Radar URL Scanner

features.title: Announcing WAF Attack Score Lite and Security Analytics for business customers
features.description: We are making the machine learning empowered WAF and Security analytics view available to our Business plan customers, to help detect and stop attacks before they are known.

imageAssetFile.altText: WAF Attack Score and Security Analytics per zone for BIZ customers
imageAssetFile.title: WAF Attack Score and Security Analytics per zone for BIZ customers

features.title: Post-quantum crypto should be free, so we're including it for free, forever
features.description: Cloudflare makes the most advanced cryptography free for everyone, and it's in beta today.

imageAssetFile.altText: Zero Trust in a Post Quantum world
imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust in a Post Quantum world

features.title: No, AI did not break post-quantum cryptography
features.description: The recent news reports of AI cracking post-quantum cryptography are greatly exaggerated. In this blog, we take a deep dive into the world of side-channel attacks and how AI has been used for more than a decade already to aid it

imageAssetFile.altText: AI did not break PQC
imageAssetFile.title: AI did not break PQC

features.title: Super Bot Fight Mode is now configurable!
features.description: Super Bot Fight Mode can be used with Skip rules now to allow for configurable deployments.

imageAssetFile.altText: Flexible Super Bot Fight Mode
imageAssetFile.title: Flexible Super Bot Fight Mode

features.title: Protect your key server with Keyless SSL and Cloudflare Tunnel integration
features.description: Now, customers will be able to use our Cloudflare Tunnels product to send traffic to the key server through a secure channel, without publicly exposing it to the rest of the Internet

imageAssetFile.altText: Keyless SSL + Cloudflare Tunnels Integration
imageAssetFile.title: Keyless SSL + Cloudflare Tunnels Integration

features.title: How Cloudflare and IBM partner to help build a better Internet
features.description: Cloudflare Fraud Detection uses machine learning models to better protect businesses from fake account signups, account takeover attacks, and carding attacks to ensure businesses can operate online safely.

imageAssetFile.altText: IBM Cloud Internet Services now includes Cloudflare Bot Management
imageAssetFile.title: IBM Cloud Internet Services now includes Cloudflare Bot Management

features.title: Stop brand impersonation with Cloudflare DMARC Management
features.description: Brand impersonation continues to be a big problem globally. Setting SPF, DKIM and DMARC policies is a great way to reduce that risk, and protect your domains from being used in spoofing emails. But maintaining a correct SPF configuration can be very costly and time consuming, and that's why we're launching Cloudflare DMARC Management.

imageAssetFile.altText: Security Center now includes ZT ( DLP and email)
imageAssetFile.title: Security Center now includes ZT ( DLP and email)

features.title: How we built DMARC Management using Cloudflare Workers
features.description: At Cloudflare, we use the Workers platform and our product stack to build new services. Read how we made the new DMARC Management solution entirely on top of our APIs.

imageAssetFile.altText: How we built it DMARC Management
imageAssetFile.title: How we built it DMARC Management

features.title: Cloudflare partners with KnowBe4 to equip organizations with real-time security coaching to avoid phishing attacks
features.description: Cloudflare's Area 1 Solution works with Knowbe4 to provide customers with security and awareness training.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare partners with KnowBe4 to offer real time email coaching to prevent human error

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a paper airplane in front of a shield

features.title: Introducing custom pages for Cloudflare Access
features.description: As more users start their day with Cloudflare Access, we're excited to announce new options to customize how those users experience our industry-leading Zero Trust solution. We're excited to announce customizable Cloudflare Access pages including login, blocks and the application launcher.

imageAssetFile.altText: Access Custom Pages
imageAssetFile.title: Access Custom Pages

features.title: Cloudflare Access is the fastest Zero Trust proxy
features.description: Cloudflare Access is 75% faster than Netskope and 50% faster than Zscaler, and our network is faster than other providers in 48% of last mile networks

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One is faster than Netskope and Palo Alto Networks

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a stopwatch inside a shield

features.title: One-click ISO 27001 certified deployment of Regional Services in the EU
features.description: Cloudflare announces one-click ISO certified region, a super easy way for customers to limit where traffic is serviced to ISO 27001 certified data centers inside the European Union

imageAssetFile.title: Regional Services one-click limit traffic to ISO 27001 certified colos only

features.title: Wildcard and multi-hostname support in Cloudflare Access
features.description: We are thrilled to announce the full support of wildcard and multi-hostname application definitions in Cloudflare Access

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Access for single page apps & Access Multi-Hostname & Wildcard support
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Access for single page apps & Access Multi-Hostname & Wildcard support

features.title: Account Security Analytics and Events: better visibility over all domains
features.description: Revealing Account Security Analytics and Events, new eyes on your account in Cloudflare dashboard to give holistic visibility. No matter how many zones you manage, they are all there!

imageAssetFile.altText: Account level Security Analytics and Security Event
imageAssetFile.title: Account level Security Analytics and Security Event

features.title: Wildcard and multi-hostname support in Cloudflare Access
features.description: We are thrilled to announce the full support of wildcard and multi-hostname application definitions in Cloudflare Access

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Access for single page apps & Access Multi-Hostname & Wildcard support
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare Access for single page apps & Access Multi-Hostname & Wildcard support
